column1: Hi! This is the spreadsheet for amberpica's unoffical "early letters" post. (I am not amberpica, just a friendly anonymous Yuletider.) There will be a 2nd letters post starting on the 17th. Happy Yuletiding!
[Newbies: Do post your letter again in the 2nd letters post on the 17th! :) This spreadsheet will stay up, but it's okay to post in that letters post as well. And welcome to Yuletide. <3]
